Hedingham Cmty. Ass’n v. GLH Builders, Inc. No. 482P06 1. Denied 10/05/06 2. Dismissed as Moot 10/05/06

3. Dismissed as Moot 10/05/06

1. Pit’s PDR Under N.C.G.S. § 7A-31 (COA05-1320)

2. Pit’s Motion to Suspend or Vary Rules of Appellate Procedure and Substitute Counsel of Record Under N.C. Rules of Appellate Procedure 2 and 33

3. Brent E. Wood’s Motion to Withdraw as Counsel
